name: hornet-showroom
description: Projet de présentation des filières de développement hornet.js et hornet.js-lite

scripts.init-snapshot: hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-batch --module=hornet-js-batch && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-bean --module=hornet-js-bean && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-components --module=hornet-js-components && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-core --module=hornet-js-core && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-database --module=hornet-js-database && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-passport --module=hornet-js-passport && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-react-components --module=hornet-js-react-components && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-test --module=hornet-js-test && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-utils --module=hornet-js-utils && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-ts-typings --module=hornet-js-ts-typings && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-themes --module=hornet-themes && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=generator-hornet-js --module=generator-hornet-js && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=generator-hornet-js-lite --module=generator-hornet-js-lite && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=generator-hornet-js-lite-batch --module=generator-hornet-js-lite-batch && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-builder --module=hornet-js-builder && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-man --module=hornet-js-man && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-community --module=hornet-js-community && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=hornet-js-gc-monitor --module=hornet-js-gc-monitor && wait && hb dependency:set-snapshot --dependencyVersionFix=applitutoriel-js --module=applitutoriel-js && wait && hb install

author: MEAE - Ministère de l'Europe et des Affaires étrangères
